hero.headline: Take back control of your digital identity
hero.subhead: A privacy-focused digital identity management platform that lets you shop, transact, and interact without surrendering your personal data to merchants, trackers, or data brokers.
hero.trustNote: Instead of social platforms defining your story, create your own identity: express your best self and share only the right elements at the right time for the safest experience. GoldenPassport lets you craft trust-based personas for every situation—share more with your favourite grocery store, less with a brand-new app you’re still evaluating.

problem.title: The data sharing problem
problem.intro: Currently, websites request access to your entire life history—even when it's not strictly needed and often unrelated to your request. GoldenPassport changes this by selectively sharing only what's necessary.

architecture.title: Real-life transaction flow
architecture.intro: See how GoldenPassport protects your identity throughout a complete purchase journey.

gdpr.title: GDPR alignment
gdpr.intro: GoldenPassport is designed from the ground up to exceed EU GDPR requirements.

cta.title: Join the privacy revolution
cta.intro: We're seeking partners and investors who share our vision for a privacy-respecting internet.

anonymousLogin.title: Vendor-neutral secure authentication
anonymousLogin.description: Authenticate without revealing your identity. Use secure tokens instead of emails, passwords, or vendor-locked authentication.

trustedTracker.title: Your trusted tracker
trustedTracker.description: Create your own trusted tracker sharing the relevant facts you're comfortable with so websites can deliver the level of service you want—without giving up your real identity.

dataMinimisation.title: You are in control
dataMinimisation.description: Always be aware of what is shared and with whom. Granular consent controls for every transaction that can be redacted in real-time.

justInTime.title: Just in time
justInTime.description: Provide data only when it's needed: authenticate up front, then share details like your address right when you're ready to purchase.

roleBased.title: Role-based
roleBased.description: Companies have specific roles in your online experience—shops sell, delivery partners deliver. Share only the data directly linked to each role (e.g., your address to delivery, not to the shop).

proxyShield.title: Proxy shield
proxyShield.description: We act as a protective intermediary to websites, social media, merchants and delivery partners.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: Even we can't see your data. Your master data lives only on your own encrypted device, protected end-to-end.

store.title: Setup account
store.description: Your identity data is encrypted and stored locally on your device. Only you hold the keys. From this, persona-based data subsets are created.

share.title: Online fingerprint
share.description: Choose which persona to share for each experience. Reveal only what's necessary, or what is required by law.

transact.title: Transact privately
transact.description: Complete purchases, deliveries, and payments without exposing your real identity, using a role-based, just-in-time approach to data sharing.

analytics.title: Anonymised Analytics for Merchants
analytics.description: Two perspectives, one goal: Merchants get persona-level signals (age ranges, general locations, interests) to understand demand and offer relevant suggestions—no need for exact details like DOB. Users stay in control, sharing richer context only with trusted businesses to make interactions meaningful (e.g., just bought a formal blue shirt and want the next shop to suggest the perfect belt). Upfront consent keeps the data flow user-led so everyone wins.

benefits.control: Users stay in control with upfront consent and reversible sharing
benefits.personalization: Merchants get persona-level insights (age bands, interests, recency) to recommend what truly fits
benefits.privacy: No raw PII; data flows just-in-time to trusted parties only

login.title: Login & Select
login.description: Authenticate with GoldenPassport and browse merchant offerings with your identity protected.

pay.title: Pay
pay.description: Complete payment through our secure proxy. Merchant never sees your real payment details.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: Receive your order at your address without the merchant ever knowing where you live.

architecture.title: Privacy-preserving architecture
architecture.caption: Data flows through GoldenPassport, never directly to third parties. GoldenPassport selectively shares only what's needed:

solutionPoints.paymentDetail: Share only what's required by law per payment type

solutionDetails.payment: No personal details, no purchase history

architecture.note: All connections use TLS 1.3 encryption. Data at rest uses AES-256.

current.title: Current Problem
current.allShared: Typically these three types of information are requested, which together can be used to build a uniquely trackable ID. Unfortunately, this digital "fingerprint" is sometimes leveraged for purposes you didn’t sign up for, or even sold on to third parties.

dangers.title: Who gets your data?
dangers.intro: When you share all your personal information, it doesn't just go to the merchant. It flows to multiple parties who may misuse it:

dataBrokers.title: Data brokers
dataBrokers.description: Companies that buy, sell, and trade your personal information without your knowledge or consent.

trackers.title: Social media trackers
trackers.description: Third-party tracking scripts that monitor your behavior across websites and build detailed profiles.

onlineFraud.title: Online fraudsters
onlineFraud.description: Scammers and fraudsters who exploit exposed personal data for identity theft, phishing, and financial scams.

merchant.title: Merchant
merchant.data: Product to pack, payment cleared. No name, no purchase history.

payment.title: Payment Provider
payment.data: Payment processed. No personal details, no purchase history.

delivery.title: Delivery Partner
delivery.data: Pickup and dropoff locations only. No name, no payment info.

pledges.rectification: Edit your information anytime. Changes propagate immediately.
pledges.erasure: One-tap data deletion. We remove everything, everywhere.
pledges.portability: Export your data in standard formats. Take it anywhere.
pledges.restriction: Pause data sharing with a single toggle. Resume when ready.
pledges.objection: Granular opt-out controls for every processing purpose.
